kamaken

Overview

  • useful functions only for the author of this package

This package contains functions customized for the author’s workflow. This package could be suddenly modified for the author’s convinience.

Installation 

if(!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Kentaro-Kamada/kamaken")

library(kamaken)
